Version 2.0.50 - Fix Race Condition with Navigation Starting Signal

Bug Fix

  • Fixed: OLD iframe could still write wrong slide before NEW navId was set
  • Added 'navigation_starting' signal that runs IMMEDIATELY when embed.php loads
  • OLD iframe now checks this signal and stops intercepting if newer navigation started

Technical Details

  • embed_renderer.php sets scorm_navigation_starting_{cmid} FIRST (before iframe loads)
  • isOurNavigationStillActive() now checks TWO things:
  • 1. scorm_current_navigation_ (set by player.php - may be too late)
  • 2. scorm_navigation_starting_ (set by embed.php - catches race condition)
  • Compares timestamps to detect if newer navigation started

Race Condition Timeline

  • T0: User clicks navigation
  • T1: embed.php loads, sets navigation_starting signal IMMEDIATELY
  • T2: OLD iframe writes, checks signal, sees newer timestamp â†’ STOPS intercepting
  • T3: player.php loads, sets scorm_current_navigation_
